title: capability io.quarkus.rest is provided by
body:
### Describe the bug

when i use `mvn install` to build the extension. it notify me that the below log.but i just depend `resteasy-reactive` in my extension.

```
Please make sure there is only one provider of the following capabilities:
capability io.quarkus.rest is provided by:
  - io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive:2.10.0.Final
  - io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy:2.10.0.Final
```

### Expected behavior

 build the extension success by `mvn install`

### Actual behavior

```
Please make sure there is only one provider of the following capabilities:
capability io.quarkus.rest is provided by:
  - io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive:2.10.0.Final
  - io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy:2.10.0.Final
```

### How to Reproduce?

this is my repo link.[quarkus-seata](https://github.com/naah69/quarkus_seata)

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macos

### Output of `java -version`

java17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

22.1

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.10.0.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

3.8.4

### Additional information

_No response_
